history.text: Hello! I am Phoenix, your mental health chatbot. How can I help you today?
I'm really concerned about your safety. Please reach out immediately to a trusted friend or a counselor: 1800-599-0019
Hello there.  It sounds like you might need someone to listen.  How can I help you today?

I appreciate you sharing your feelings with me.  While I can't reciprocate romantic feelings, I'm here to listen and support you in any way I can.  Is there anything else you'd like to talk about today?
